    • ClientInit

      public void ClientInit() throws IOException
      initialize all the buffer and stream used to comunicate with the socket
      Throws:
      IOException - socket error

    • clientLogin

      public int clientLogin(String user, String psw)
      Method that send the autentication request to the server
      Parameters:
      user - user identifier (in this case the fiscal Code)
      psw - password of the user
      Returns:
      the result of the request (1->success , 0->user or psw wrong, -1->comunication error)

    • clientUserRegistration

      public int clientUserRegistration(String name, String surname, String psw, String cf, String address)
      Method used to send the request for the registration of a new partner
      Parameters:
      name - name of the new partner
      surname - surname of the new partner
      psw - psw of the new partner
      cf - fiscal code of the new partner
      address - address of the new partner
      Returns:
      the result of the request

      Parameters:
      CF - partner's fiscal code
      Returns:
      a list that cantains all the boats of the partner

      Returns:
      a list that contains all the partner's payment

      Returns:
      a list that contains all the competition list

      public int addPayment(String CF, Float amount, String deadLine, String description)
      Methods that sends the request to add a new payment
      Parameters:
      CF - partner's fiscal code that has to pay
      amount - amount of the payment
      deadLine - deadline of the payment
      description - description of the payment
